name: Zakk Wylde
description:
'''Zachary Phillip Wylde''' (born '''Jeffrey Phillip Wielandt'''; January 14, 1967) is an American musician. He is best known as the lead guitarist for [[Ozzy Osbourne]] and as the founder, lead guitarist, lead singer, songwriter and producer of the [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band [[Black Label Society]]. 

Wylde's signature bulls-eye design appears on many of his guitars. He was also the lead guitarist and vocalist of [[Pride & Glory (band)|Pride & Glory]], who released one [[Pride & Glory (album)|self-titled album]] in 1994 before disbanding. As a solo artist, he released the albums ''[[Book of Shadows (album)|Book of Shadows]]'' and ''[[Book of Shadows II]]''. Wylde joined the reunited [[Pantera]] in 2022 as a touring guitarist.
